original: Plague of Pigeons in the City.  These are the infection sites.
translated: 鸽子在全城引发瘟疫，以下是受感染区域

original: There's a plague coming!  Infected pigeons are all over the city and it's only a matter of time before it spreads to humans and we're all coughing out our pancreases and pus is pouring out from all our pores.  I've seen 200 diseased pigeons in Liberty.  Is it just a coincidence?  Come on!  Betta pharmaceuticals manufacture a pigeon flu vaccine, diseased pigeons arrive in Liberty City.  Connect the dots!  We're all gonna die just to push the Beta stock price higher on the BAWSAQ.  Someone needs to get rid of the pigeons.  Think of the children!
translated: 瘟疫来袭！城里到处是带病的鸽子，感染人类只是时间问题了。我们连内脏都要呛出来了，毛孔里也都烂了。我在自由城见到了200只染病的鸽子。这仅仅只是巧合吗？贝塔制药研发了一款鸽瘟疫苗，瘟疫鸽子就来到自由城了。很难不联想！为了抬高贝塔制药的BAWSAQ股价，我们都要没命了。需要有人出来扑杀鸽子。替孩子们考虑考虑吧！

original: I'm never leaving my apartment again.  We're all going to catch Pigeon Flu and die!!!
translated: 再也不出门了，我们要得鸽瘟死掉啦！！！

original: Thx. I hope someone gets those fuckers.
translated: 谢谢，真希望谁能把这些鸽子解决了。

original: Leave the pigeons alone.  They never did anything to anyone.  Is someone working on an organic, non animal tested cure?
translated: 不许碰鸽子，它们没有伤害任何人。有人在研究不进行动物实验的有机疗法吗？

original: Pigeons speak to me... They send a message of love.
translated: 鸽子说话了...它们说爱我们。
